column1: Elder Harris, from the Hasidic sect.
Yes, but we have milked this simple mountain folk almost dry. If we really want to see cash flow, we need to bring in city people from Denver.
There you are, sir. There's the check for your home. Just sign here, and here.
Last night I spoke with the spirit of the bear, and Bear said that if we do not build our highway soon, our investors may soon sell off their shares of the new casino.
